name: Nohzdyve
overview: You're falling fast through the sky! Collect eyeballs and avoid the buildings and other hazards. Perfection is key. This was truly a five star game by none other than Colin Ritman. Play Nohzdyve on your ZX Spectrum emulator. Warning: You may become addicted to increasing your score. (This is the game from Black Mirror: Bandersnatch. The description is from the website devoted to the fictional game developer, Tuckersoft)
